Package meka.experiment.datasetproviders

Class MultiDatasetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.events.LogObject
      • meka.experiment.datasetproviders.AbstractDatasetProvider
        • meka.experiment.datasetproviders.MultiDatasetProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterator<weka.core.Instances>, LogSupporter, DatasetProvider, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class MultiDatasetProvider
extends AbstractDatasetProvider
    Combines multiple dataset providers.

    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
